T02D2175:29a-1: badzra p'a ni n'i l'amba ra dha ra ba lim ta bidhi:/
T02D2175:29a-3: phyag na rdo rje gos sngon can gyi gtor ma'i
T02D2175:29a-4: cho ga /'phags pa phyag na rdo rje gos sngon
T02D2175:29a-6: sgrub pa rnams la phan gdags phyir //
T02D2175:29a-7: bdag gis gtor ma bshad par bya //
T02D2175:29a-8: phan gdags pa dang tshar gcad pa //
T02D2175:29a-9: phan pa mchog dang thun mong ngo //
T02D2175:29a-10: gsang ba bla med mchog tu 'dod //
T02D2175:29a-11: phyi nang thun mong shes par bya //
T02D2175:29a-12: rgyas dang bsdus dang shin tu bsdus //
T02D2175:29a-13: tshar gcad pa yang shes par bya //
T02D2175:29a-14: dgug dang bskrad dang gsad pa dang //
T02D2175:29a-15: mnan dang bsreg par shes par bya //
T02D2175:29a-16: rgyun nam dus chen bzhi gsum gnyis //
T02D2175:29a-17: chung ngu rgyun nam chen po ni //
T02D2175:29a-18: bcu gnyis bzhi'am tha ma gcig / rtsa ba lnga dang yan lag lnga //
T02D2175:29a-19: 'bru dang shing thog sman rnams dang //
T02D2175:29a-20: chan thug khur ba la sogs pa'i //
T02D2175:29a-21: rdzas rnams thams cad tshogs par bsags //
T02D2175:29a-22: de steng dkar gsum klu la shis //
T02D2175:29b-0: khrag sna snying sna sha sna @29b gsum //
T02D2175:29b-1: de sogs thun rdzas tshar gcod do //
T02D2175:29b-2: bskyed rim tshul du bya ba dang //
T02D2175:29b-3: bla ma nas bzung bsrung byas la //
T02D2175:29b-4: cho ga gsum du bskyed pa'am //
T02D2175:29b-5: chung ngu skad cig lhar bskyad la //
T02D2175:29b-6: mtshan dang ldan pa'i padma ru //
T02D2175:29b-7: rdzas rnams kun gyis bkang nas ni //
T02D2175:29b-8: steng du rdo rje sngon po bsam ;
T02D2175:29b-9: / khong seng can la h'um gis mtshan //
T02D2175:29b-10: mtho gang la ni ri bong can //
T02D2175:29b-11: de la bcu drug bdun pas mtshan //
T02D2175:29b-12: rdo rje mtshan ldan bar du ni //
T02D2175:29b-13: sdud spyod 'phro ba'i mthing dmar dkar //
T02D2175:29b-14: pad 'og ye shes lnga ldan gsum //
T02D2175:29b-15: gru gsum 'og na zla gam can //
T02D2175:29b-16: thugs kyi mthing gnag 'phros pa las //
T02D2175:29b-17: rdo rje lte bskul mtha' gnyis bskyod //
T02D2175:29b-18: dmar po 'bar bas mtshan ldan dros //
T02D2175:29b-19: thugs kyis bsdus shing gsung gis sbyangs //
T02D2175:29b-20: sku las 'phros pas ri bong bskul //
T02D2175:29b-22: de yis yab yum bskul nas ni //
T02D2175:29b-23: kha dog dkar pos bdud rtsi phob //
T02D2175:29b-24: dang po skul byed 'og tu zhu //
T02D2175:29b-25: khong seng can nas padmar babs //
T02D2175:29b-26: babs pa'i rting la de nyid lhung //
T02D2175:29b-27: lan gsum bskor nas 'o ma bzhin //
T02D2175:29b-28: lnga pa'i dang po lnga pas mtshan //
T02D2175:29b-29: de yis gdan bskyed 'khor bcas dgug / ji h'um rdo rje khong seng can //
T02D2175:29b-30: bdud rtsi gsol bas mnyes par bsam //
T02D2175:29b-31: yang na lha mo dkar po yis //
T02D2175:29b-32: mtshan ldan gyis ni bkad nas mchod //
T02D2175:29b-33: bstod nas bshags shing las bcol lo //
T02D2175:29b-34: de yang rgyas dang bsdus dang shin tu bsdus //
T02D2175:29b-35: de ltar byas nas gshegs su gsol //
T02D2175:29b-36: yang na skad cig lhar bskyed la //
T02D2175:29b-37: thugs ka'i h'um gis bdud rtsi sbyangs //
T02D2175:29b-38: slar yang ye shes bdud rtsi phab //
T02D2175:29b-39: yud cam sbrul pas lha yis gsol //
T02D2175:29b-40: yud tsam mos pas gsum ka gsol //
T02D2175:29b-41: shin tu bsdus pas zas de bzhin //
T02D2175:29b-42: phan gdags pa'i sbyor ka ste dang po'o /
T02D2175:29b-44: // / dgug pa'i gtor ma'i cho ga ni //
T02D2175:29b-45: thun mong cho ga thams cad ni //
T02D2175:29b-46: thun mong gtor ma dang mthun no //
T02D2175:29b-47: khyad par gtor ma bstan pa ni //
T02D2175:29b-48: dur khrod 'jigs pa'i gnas dag tu //
T02D2175:29b-49: shin tu dmar ba'i gos gyon la //
T02D2175:29b-50: nub kyi phyogs su kha bltas te //
T02D2175:29b-51: cho ga gsum gyis lhar bskyed pa'am//
T02D2175:30a-0: @30a * // cho ga rnam lngas lhar bskyed pa //
T02D2175:30a-1: gang yang rung byas byin gyis brlab //
T02D2175:30a-2: gtor ma'i rdzas ni thun mong rdzas steng du //
T02D2175:30a-3: khyad par rdzas ni rakta sna tshogs dang //
T02D2175:30a-4: gshog pa can gyi sha sna sna chogs shis //
T02D2175:30a-5: byin gyis brlabs la bde gshegs mchod //
T02D2175:30a-6: gnyis pa mkha' 'gro ma la mchod //
T02D2175:30a-7: gsum pa chos skyong rnams la mchod //
T02D2175:30a-8: bzhi pas 'byung po thams cad tshim par bya //
T02D2175:30a-9: yang na 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa gnyis su mchod par bya'o //
T02D2175:30a-10: sngags ni rtsa ba'i sngags la ba lim ta kha
T02D2175:30a-11: kha kh'a hi kh'a hi zhes lan bdun nam nyi
T02D2175:30a-13: mkha' 'gro ma'i sngags ni aom buddha d'a ki n'i //
T02D2175:30a-18: sa ma ya d'a ki n'i //
T02D2175:30a-20: ai dam ba lim ta kha kha /
T02D2175:30a-22: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dpal mgon po nag po ni mkha' 'gro ma'i gtso bo yin pas //
T02D2175:30a-23: rtsa ba'i sngags la btags te dbul //
T02D2175:30a-24: 'jig rten pa'i mgon po nag po ni phyogs skyong
T02D2175:30a-25: gi gtso bo yin pas sngags kyang gong bzhin shes
T02D2175:30a-26: par bya / phyogs skyong gi sngags ni /
T02D2175:30a-27: aindra zhes bya ba las kyi tshogs dang mthun /
T02D2175:30a-28: 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma'i sngags ni aom
T02D2175:30a-29: aa k'a ro mu kham zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D2175:30a-30: pas bya'o // de nas bstod pa bya zhing phrin las bcol //
T02D2175:30a-32: des su thams cad bskul nas ni //
T02D2175:30a-33: gang la bya ba dgug par bsam //
T02D2175:30a-34: de 'dra lan grangs brgya nas stong //
T02D2175:30a-36: 'gugs pa'i sbyor ka ste gnyis pa'o /
T02D2175:30a-38: // / bskrad pa'i gtor ma'i sbyor ka ni //
T02D2175:30a-39: thun mong cho ga thams cad ni //
T02D2175:30a-40: thun mong gtor ma dag dang mthun //
T02D2175:30a-41: khyad par gtor ma phal cher yang //
T02D2175:30a-42: bskrad pa'i tshogs kyi sbyor ka ste //
T02D2175:30a-43: man ngag khyad par bstan pa ni //
T02D2175:30a-44: shing lo'am gro ga dag la ni //
T02D2175:30a-45: rlung dang bsgrub bya'i gzugs bris la //
T02D2175:30a-46: 'od zer rlung gis bskyod pa dang //
T02D2175:30a-47: khro bo dag gis bskyod pa dang //
T02D2175:30a-48: rlung lha dag gis bskyod nas ni //
T02D2175:30a-49: nam mkha' mtha' gtugs bskyal bar bya //
T02D2175:30b-0: bskrad pa'i gtor @30b ma'i sbyor ka ste gsum pa'o /
T02D2175:30b-2: // / mnan pa'ang gong ma bzhin te mthun //
T02D2175:30b-3: khyad par ri rab 'bum dang ni //
T02D2175:30b-4: rdo rje dang ni khro bo yang //
T02D2175:30b-6: sbyor ba gzhan dang man ngag bzhin //
T02D2175:30b-7: mnan pa'i sbyor ka ste bzhi pa'o /
T02D2175:30b-9: // / gsad pa khro bos gsad pa dang //
T02D2175:30b-10: mtshon cha'i char sogs dbab pas gsad //
T02D2175:30b-11: sngags dang phyag rgya rdzas sogs gzhan //
T02D2175:30b-12: mkhas pas man ngag sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D2175:30b-13: gsad pa'i sbyor ka ste lnga pa'o /
T02D2175:30b-15: // / bsreg pa sku gsung thugs kyis bsreg / yang na me la sogs pa yi //
T02D2175:30b-16: sbyor ba gzhan du shes par bya'o //
T02D2175:30b-17: bsreg pa'i sbyor ka ste drug pa'o /
T02D2175:30b-19: // / bcing ba yi ni sbyor ba yang //
T02D2175:30b-20: sku gsung thugs kyi sbyar ba yis //
T02D2175:30b-21: lu gu rgyud dang zhags pa dang //
T02D2175:30b-22: lcags sgrog la sogs sbyor ba yis //
T02D2175:30b-23: mkhas pa yis ni bcing bar bya //
T02D2175:30b-24: bcing ba'i sbyor ba ste bdun pa'o /
T02D2175:30b-26: // / klu dang rgyal po gnyis las ni ;
T02D2175:30b-27: / khyad par gtor ma bstan pa ni //
T02D2175:30b-28: dngul dang 'khar ba shing phor dang //
T02D2175:30b-29: sa dkar snod du bya bar shis //
T02D2175:30b-30: sman sna 'bru sna snying po lnga //
T02D2175:30b-31: dkar gsum mngang [?] gsum klu la shis //
T02D2175:30b-32: rin chen snod ni mdzes pa ru //
T02D2175:30b-33: rin chen lnga dang 'bru sna lnga //
T02D2175:30b-34: dar zab shing thog la sogs pa //
T02D2175:30b-35: rgyal po nyid la shis par gsungs //
T02D2175:30b-36: de gnyis byin gyis brlab pa yang //
T02D2175:30b-37: rdzas kyi steng du hr'i:'am h'um //
T02D2175:30b-38: de yi 'od kyis rdzas rnams bsreg / skyen dag nas ni bdud rtsir bsam //
T02D2175:30b-39: de nas lag pa g-yas pa ni //
T02D2175:30b-40: mchog sbyin byas pa'i lag mthil du //
T02D2175:30b-41: brim las dpag bsam shing lo bsam //
T02D2175:30b-42: de yi yal ga'i gseb tu ni //
T02D2175:30b-43: si las bdud rtsi'i bum pa bsam //
T02D2175:30b-44: de yis bdud rtsi yi ni rgyun //
T02D2175:30b-45: lag mthil du ni babs nas kyang //
T02D2175:30b-46: gtor ma'i nang du 'dres par bsam //
T02D2175:30b-47: de nas aom a'a:h'um lan gsum bzlas //
T02D2175:30b-48: de nas rang gi mdun du padma bzhi bsam /
T02D2175:30b-49: de nas rang gi snying ga'i h'um gi 'od kyis /
T02D2175:30b-50: klu thams cad ni padmar bkug /'od zer 'phros pas sbyong sogs bya //
T02D2175:30b-51: thams cad 'od du zhu ba las //
T02D2175:30b-52: bde gshegs sku yi sbrul pa'am //
T02D2175:30b-53: gsung gi rigs kyi lta ru gyur //
T02D2175:30b-54: spyan drangs bstim zhing dbang bskur bya //
T02D2175:31a-1: rtse lnga sbu gu can du bsams la /
T02D2175:31a-2: des drangs la gsol bar bsam /
T02D2175:31a-4: aom ba su ki ba lim ta kh'a hi zhes
T02D2175:31a-5: klu rnams kyi so so'i rtsa ba'i sngags la btags
T02D2175:31a-7: gshegs su gsol ba'i sngags ni badzra mu: zhes btags la gshegs su gsol //
T02D2175:31a-8: rgyal po yang sprul pa dang las kyi rigs su bsam /
T02D2175:31a-9: phyi ma mthun te man ngag tu shes par bya'o //
T02D2175:31a-10: klu dang rgyal po'i sbyor ka ste brgyad pa'o /
T02D2175:31a-12: // / de dag thams cad phyi yin no //
T02D2175:31a-13: nang gi snying ga'i lha rnams la //
T02D2175:31a-14: gtor ma zas rnams yin pas na //
T02D2175:31a-15: bdud rtsir byin gyis brlabs nas ni //
T02D2175:31a-16: lha la ting nge 'dzin gyis dbul //
T02D2175:31a-17: de ni rnal 'byor lam ba yin //
T02D2175:31a-18: phyag rgya phyag rgya'i man ngag bzhin //
T02D2175:31a-19: nang gi gtor ma'i sbyor ka ste dgu pa'o /
T02D2175:31a-21: // / gsang ba'i gtor ma'i sbyor ka ni //
T02D2175:31a-22: lte ba padma gtor ma'i snod //
T02D2175:31a-23: de steng zla ba'i steng du ni ;
T02D2175:31a-24: / byang chub sems kyi kunda la //
T02D2175:31a-25: bdud rtsi la sogs yon tan sogs //
T02D2175:31a-26: gtor ma'i rdzas su bstan pa yin //
T02D2175:31a-27: de 'og rlung sngon bskyod pa las //
T02D2175:31a-28: me 'bar bdud rtsi zhu ste phab //
T02D2175:31a-31: gsang ba'i gtor ma'i sbyor ka ste bcu ba'o /
T02D2175:31a-33: // / bla med gtor ma'i sbyor ka ni //
T02D2175:31a-34: lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba la //
T02D2175:31a-35: thams cad rdzogs pa'i man ngag tshang //
T02D2175:31a-36: bla na med pa'i man ngag gi sbyor ka ste bcu gcig pa'o /
T02D2175:31a-38: // / gtor ma'i man ngag sbyor ka rnams //
T02D2175:31a-39: man ngag rim pa bkod pa yis //
T02D2175:31a-40: bdag dang mtha' yas sems can rnams //
T02D2175:31a-41: bla med byang chub thob par shog / slob dpon bha bas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
